<RequestExample>

```nix hosts-nixos/example.nix
{hardware, ...}: {
    imports = [hardware.hetzner-x86];
}
```

</RequestExample>
<ResponseExample>

```nix darwin-hosts/example.nix
{hardware, ...}: {
    imports = [hardware.m1];
}
```

</ResponseExample>
